content: stitches on top of foot and insole that is decrease 2 on the top of foot for small and large sizes and decrease 2 on insole for medium and x-large sizes round 1 knit round 2 knit 1 ssk 1 0 1 0 knit to 3 stitches before marker k2 decrease 1 0 1 0 k1 sl marker knit 1 ssk 0 1 0 1 knit to 3 stitches before marker k2 decrease 0 1 0 1 k1 2 stitches decreased round 3 knit round 4 knit 1 ssk knit to 3 stitches before marker k2 decrease k1 sl marker knit 1 ssk knit to 3 stitches before marker k2 decrease k1 4 stitches decreased repeat last two rounds until 18 22 26 30 stitches remain finishing graft toe stitches using kitchener stitch weave in ends block if desired © rachel gent 2016 v1 0 3 pattern for personal use only
